Hands on Experience on Java Coding. Hands on working experience in Spring.    Good in SQL queries. Web services- preferred Google API, Apache POI.    Ability to write complex algorithms with ease and writing with minimum iterations. Out of box thinking for technical solution of the problem.    Very robust problem identification and solving skills. Ability to create own niche technical architecture to complete complex stories in line with the overall architecture (picks the right framework/tool/design patterns).
